WHERE country = 'NO' AND city IN (

    WHERE rownum = 3
) AND pool = 1;

AND ocean_view = 1 AND pet_friendly IN ('no pets', 'pets allowed on request') 
AND increased_accessibility = 1 OR unit_wheelchair_accessible = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Cancun' AND (beach_access = 'private beach' OR beach_access = 'beach access');
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Rio-de-Janeiro' AND pets_allowed_on_request = 'pets allowed on request' AND airport_shuttle IN ('possible', 'free');
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'MX' AND stars >= 4 AND (pool = 1 OR child_pool = 1) ORDER BY stars DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Miami' AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Rio-de-Janeiro' AND country = 'BR' AND (pets_allowed = 'no pets' OR pets_allowed = 'pets allowed on request') AND wifi = 'free';

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Miami' AND washing_and_drier = 'free';

WHERE country = 'US' AND city = 'Boston' AND pet_friendly IN ('no pets', 'pets allowed on request') AND parking != 'no' AND casino = 1 AND stars >= 3;

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Madrid' AND spa = 1 AND wifi = 'free' AND pool = 1 AND child_pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Paris' AND country = 'FR' AND stars >= 5 AND (spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND bar = 1);

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DK' AND city = (SELECT city FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DK' AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND state = 'Region Hovedstaden') AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'AT' AND city = 'Wien' AND stars >= 4 AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND rating >= 8 AND review_count > 100;

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Corfu' AND country = 'GR' AND rating >= 8 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR increased_accessibility = 1) AND (spa = 1 OR washing_and_drier = 1 OR golf = 1) AND adults_only = 0;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Roma' AND stars >= 4 AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND ocean_view = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Copenhagen' AND country = 'DK' AND (pool = 1 OR child_pool = 1) AND playground = 1 AND stars <= 3;
